title: Venti's Cafe and Taphouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Its 2nd and larger location. Has a separate vegan menu available with small plates, snacks, and entrees (ask for it). The vegan dishes are bowls filled with vegetable and grain and sauces, two house-made vegan burgers,  vegan nachos, baked, organic tofu, falafel plate, curried tofu trips, spicy tots. Everything is from scratch and uses mostly local products. Local beers and kombucha, including a special house-made beer. Has happy hours.
